name: @superflag/super-ipc
description: A sanely typed convenience wrapper around electron ipc
author: Blake Stacks

scripts.build-types:both: npm run build-types:es6 && npm run build-types:cjs
scripts.build-types:cjs: pnpm run --filter @superflag/super-ipc-core build:cjs && pnpm run -r build:cjs
scripts.build-types:es6: pnpm run --filter @superflag/super-ipc-core build:es6 && pnpm run -r build:es6
scripts.pub: pnpm run build-types:es6 && pnpm publish -r && pnpm run clean
